Being able to set a locale in hubl would be dope. `{{ set_locale('de') }}`

Similar to how the `{{set_response_code(404)}}`  works.

Thinking about making use of this on system pages where we can grab a url param passed from a translated page. Or a `{{request.referrer}}`  so that we can determine if the previous page was a translated page and then setting the pageâ€™s locale to match that of the referring page. This would enable us to more easily create translated system pages.

Make sense?
